attributes.action:
Form a Government of National Unity to
 expedite our exit from the EU.
attributes.background: With the two main parties in disarray, the Liberals threatening to over-ride the referendum, and the Scottish National and Irish republicans wanting to leave the UK, I believe the best action would be to form a cross bench Government of National Unity to ensure the exit from the EU goes smoothly.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/137155
